info.comment:
-=About=-
This is a mod of my old game, Fable Quest. This new version features a few glitches fixed, some new graphics/improvements and some other stuff.

-=How to Play=-
Fable Quest: Mystic Jounrey is a miniture action RPG. Defeat enemies to gain gold, hp and levels. Unlock new areas by reaching a certian level. To beat the game, defeat the Dragon boss, and reach level 25

-=Quests=-
You can check what quest you are up to using the quest log, in the top right corner. Just click to open/close it. I suggest to leave it open :)

-=Controls=-
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
E: Talk to People
Q: Attack
info.author: 08jackt

scripts: That Map over there allows you to change Area!

You may be able to find him in Fable Forest!
Thanks! Ill go get your reward now!
